verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my cry <S%H7440><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.

From the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto you <S%H3820><s%>, when my heart is overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%>: lead <S%H5148><s%> me to the rock <S%H6697><s%> that is higher than I <S%H7311><s%>.
For you have been a shelter <S%H4268><s%> for me <S%H5797><s%>, and a strong tower <S%H4026><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%>.
I will stay <S%H1481><s%> in your tabernacle <S%H168><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: I will trust <S%H2620><s%> in the shelter <S%H5643><s%> of your wings <S%H3671><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
For you <S%H430><s%>, O God, have heard <S%H8085><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%>: you have given <S%H5414><s%> me the heritage <S%H3425><s%> of those that fear <S%H3373><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>.
You will prolong <S%H3254><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s life <S%H3117><s%>: and his years <S%H8141><s%> as many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
He shall stay <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: O prepare <S%H4487><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>, which may preserve him <S%H5341><s%>.
So will I sing <S%H2167><s%> praise unto your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>, that I may daily <S%H3117><s%> perform <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%>.
